$schema.description: strictly for schema validation not used internally

keypressDelay.description: The default keypressDelay to use if not provided at the call site

launchChannelId.description: The default channel id to launch if one isn't passed in

clientDebugLogging.description: Enable debug logging on the client side

forwardProxy.description: Useful for visually debugging issues. Use in the format like (http://127.0.0.1:8888). DOES NOT WORK WITH RELATIVE REDIRECTS IN CHARLES!!!

port.description: What port the proxy will run on. If not provided will find one itself

clientDebugLogging.description: Enable debug logging on the client side

defaultBase.description: Allows specifying the default base that will be used if one was not provided in the args for a request

disableCallOriginationLine.description: We normally try to include the line that the actual ODC call originated from. When not used specifically for testing this isn't needed as much and has a small over head as we have to throw and exception to get the line

disableTelnet.description: We normally pull the telnet logs if the request timed out. If the telnet connection is already in use then this just adds additional noise in the output

helperInjection.description: Used to inject additional helpers to allow additional functionality

componentPaths.description: List of paths to xml components to inject additional helpers into

enabled.description: Gives a simple way to enable to disable helper injection. Defaults to true

restoreRegistry.description:
Before running any requests will pull the contents of the registry on the device and store it until ODC is shutdown.
At which point it will clear the registry completely and write back the stored registry values that were previously stored.

uiResolution.description: The resolution we will use when specifying pixel values. If not specified defaults to `fhd`

deviceIndex.description: zero based index of which `devices` index to use. If not provided defaults to 0

defaultTimeout.description: If not overridden at the call site how long to wait before assuming a request failed

host.description: The IP address or hostname of the target Roku device.

password.description: The password for logging in to the developer portal on the target Roku device

properties.description: User defined list of properties for this device (name, isLowEnd, etc)

screenshotFormat.description: Devices default to jpg but if you've changed to png you'll need so supply this

timeoutMultiplier.description: Multiplier applied to request timeouts for all requests including those with an explicit value. Can be used in combination with defaultTimeout

proxy.description: Useful for debugging port 80 and ECP communication between Roku and client. Use in the format like (127.0.0.1:8888).

appId.description: AppId of the application we're retrieving tests from from Suitest

tokenId.description: TokenId for API access as supplied by Suitest

tokenPassword.description: Token password for API access as supplied by Suitest

version.description: The version of the application we're retrieving for
